Author: CiPhEr#2091
Content:
Question on how orders are matched- I know in a typical exchange if I put an order in for say 200 sats and there are orders for 150 sats 175 sats and 200 sats, the coins offered at lower prices will be matched first. 

How does adex work in this regard? I noticed there are numerous orders listed, would it let me 'pay too much' if I chose the wrong one?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
> would it let me 'pay too much' if I chose the wrong one?
yes

Author: Bitfinger#6245
Content: @CiPhEr you can think of it more like localbitcoins (p2p) where you can choose a different 'ad' with a higher price rather than a regular CEX which will match the top of the order book.
